Hello, my name is Cristiane Taniguti and in this website I keep photos and my story in circus activities, mainly aerial silk. Currently, I am PhD candidate in University of São Paulo at Genetics and Plant Breeding program. I have the circus activities as a way of rest and to express myself. If you want to know more avout my work as research access the menu at the right corner.
